Actress Kashmira Irani Career, First TV Serial

Manmarziyan serial actress Kashmira Irani biography will showcase her real and strong personality.Manmarziyan serial actress Wiki can never be justified without her role of Amber in the famous show “Amber Dhara” that aired on Sony Entertainment channel. It was her debut show and Kashmira Irani’s first TV serial. Kashmira Irani in “Amber Dhara” was the conjoined twin of Dhara, which was played by Sulagna Panigrahi and the story revolves around how the two sisters struggle and overcome every obstacle that comes their way for being handicapped.

After “Amber Dhara”, Kashmira had acted in Yash Raj’s TV Serial Seven again on SONY Channel. The show was about extra-ordinary people possessing supernatural powers which they used to fight against evil and safeguard society and people. Kashmira played role of Varya in the show. Kashmira Irani TV serials don’t end here. She got the opportunity to act in the show Left Right Left on SAB TV.
